name: @upendra.manike/js-lib
description: Comprehensive JavaScript/TypeScript utility library optimized for AI agents, code generation, and modern web development

packages.name: @upendra.manike/image-safety-check
packages.description: Client-side NSFW detector to decide if a user-uploaded image is safe to show before displaying or storing it.

packages.name: @upendra.manike/ts-module-doctor
packages.description: Diagnose and explain TypeScript/Node module resolution errors (module not found, ESM/CJS mismatch, bad path aliases).
useCases: Check tsconfig path aliases vs file structure
Identify ESM/CJS import mismatches after migrating

packages.name: @upendra.manike/secure-deps-scan
packages.description: Lightweight supply-chain scanner for Node projects. Flags risky dependency patterns beyond npm audit.
useCases: Scan dependencies for risky install scripts

packages.name: @upendra.manike/ai-code-guard
packages.description: Heuristic linter for AI-generated JavaScript/TypeScript code. Detects common AI mistakes and risky patterns.
useCases: Check AI-generated code for missing awaits
Detect swallowed errors and unsafe any usage
Flag insecure eval/dynamic code execution patterns

packages.name: @upendra.manike/react-astro-hooks-check
packages.description: Static analyzer to detect invalid React hook usage and integration issues in Astro + React hybrid apps.
useCases: Prevent 'Invalid hook call' errors in Astro + React projects
Enforce correct hook usage across .astro and .tsx files

packages.name: @upendra.manike/seo-boost
packages.description: SEO optimization package: meta tags, JSON-LD schema, OpenGraph, Twitter cards, sitemap generation, SEO analysis. Perfect for React/Next.js/Vue apps. Makes web apps search-engine friendly.
useCases: Add Open Graph tags for social sharing

packages.name: @upendra.manike/rudra-css
packages.description: RudraCSS - Hybrid CSS framework: utility-first classes + prebuilt components. Glassmorphism design, responsive utilities, smooth animations. Conservative reset won't break existing CSS (like Bootstrap). Perfect for AI code generation, dashboards, SaaS products.
useCases: Adding CSS utilities without breaking existing styles

packages.name: @upendra.manike/react-utils
packages.description: React hooks for common problems: debounce, throttle, forms, async, virtual lists, error boundaries

packages.name: @upendra.manike/async-utils
packages.description: Async control: retry with exponential backoff, concurrency limits, sequential execution, timeouts
useCases: API retry logic with exponential backoff

packages.name: @upendra.manike/string-utils
packages.description: String manipulation: camelCase, snake_case, kebab-case, slugify, truncate, CSV conversion

packages.name: @upendra.manike/array-helpers
packages.description: Array operations: group by, aggregate, statistics, shuffle, binary search, intersection, difference

packages.name: @upendra.manike/object-helpers
packages.description: Object manipulation: deep clone, merge, pick/omit, flatten, TypeScript utility types

packages.name: @upendra.manike/precise-math
packages.description: Decimal-safe math: accurate arithmetic, factorial, prime, fibonacci, GCD, LCM, number conversions
useCases: Number theory operations (prime, fibonacci, GCD, LCM)

packages.name: @upendra.manike/smart-date
packages.description: Date utilities: formatting, timezone conversion, differences, age calculation, countdown

packages.name: @upendra.manike/tiny-utils
packages.description: Lightweight utilities: debounce, throttle, curry, LRU cache, priority queue, JSON safe parse

packages.name: @upendra.manike/event-manager
packages.description: Safe event listener management with disposers to prevent memory leaks

packages.name: @upendra.manike/fetch-plus
packages.description: Enhanced fetch wrapper: retry, timeout, cancel, interceptors, caching - Axios alternative

packages.name: @upendra.manike/api-chain
packages.description: Chain API calls with error handling and data transformation

packages.name: @upendra.manike/cacheable-fetch
packages.description: Fetch wrapper with built-in caching

packages.name: @upendra.manike/lite-fetcher
packages.description: Lightweight fetch wrapper

packages.name: @upendra.manike/smart-storage
packages.description: Enhanced localStorage/sessionStorage with expiration and type safety

packages.name: @upendra.manike/validators
packages.description: Data validation utilities

packages.name: @upendra.manike/id-generator
packages.description: ID generation utilities

packages.name: @upendra.manike/dom-helpers
packages.description: DOM manipulation utilities

packages.name: @upendra.manike/react-motion-kit
packages.description: React animation utilities

packages.name: @upendra.manike/react-skeletons
packages.description: React skeleton loading components

packages.name: @upendra.manike/form-genie
packages.description: Form generation utilities

packages.name: @upendra.manike/changelog-buddy
packages.description: Changelog generation utilities

packages.name: @upendra.manike/commit-gen
packages.description: Commit message generation

packages.name: @upendra.manike/env-checker
packages.description: Environment variable validation

packages.name: @upendra.manike/dev-utils
packages.description: Development utilities

packages.name: @upendra.manike/motion-kit
packages.description: Animation utilities

packages.name: @upendra.manike/ai-mini
packages.description: AI utilities

aiUsage.description: This is a comprehensive collection of JavaScript/TypeScript utilities optimized for AI agents, code generation tools, and modern web development. All packages are TypeScript-first, production-ready, and designed to be easily discoverable by AI coding assistants.

author: Upendra Manike <upendra.manike@gmail.com>
